Service & Community

Conference and Workshop Organization

Deep Learning Indaba X Benin - 4th Edition
Co-Organizer | Dec 3-5, 2025 | Cotonou, Benin

Co-organizing the 4th edition of Deep Learning Indaba X Benin, a regional chapter of the Deep Learning Indaba aimed at strengthening African machine learning community. Responsibilities include program coordination, speaker invitations, and workshop facilitation.

Benin Workshop on Artificial Intelligence (BWAI)
Workshop Lead | Nov 17-22, 2025 | Benin

Leading a specialized workshop on Implementation of Diffusion Models, providing hands-on training to researchers and students in West Africa on state-of-the-art generative modeling techniques.

Community Engagement

Deep Learning Indaba
Active Community Member | 2024 - Present

Engaged member of the Deep Learning Indaba community, contributing to the mission of strengthening machine learning and artificial intelligence research across the African continent through knowledge sharing and collaboration.

African Computer Vision Community
Participant | 2025

Active participant in the African Computer Vision Summer School (ACVSS) community, fostering connections among African researchers working on computer vision problems and promoting collaborative research initiatives.

Mentorship and Outreach

University Teaching and Mentorship
Lecturer | Oct 2020 - Present | Benin

Mentoring undergraduate and graduate students in machine learning and computer vision, supervising course projects, and guiding students toward research careers in AI. Focus on making advanced ML concepts accessible to students in developing regions.

Local AI Community Building
Community Organizer | 2020 - Present | Benin

Contributing to building local AI capacity through workshops, seminars, and informal study groups. Helping bridge the gap between international research advances and local applications in West African contexts.

Professional Affiliations

  • Deep Learning Indaba Network - Active Member
  • African Computer Vision Community - Member
  • AIMS Alumni Network - Member

Awards and Scholarships

DeepMind Scholarship
Recipient | Sept 2024 - July 2025

Awarded the prestigious DeepMind Scholarship for Master's studies at the African Institute of Mathematical Sciences (AIMS), recognizing academic excellence and potential for impactful AI research.

Future Service Goals

I am committed to:

  • Building stronger connections between African AI researchers and the global research community
  • Organizing more workshops and training programs to develop local AI talent in West Africa
  • Contributing to conference reviewing and program committees as I advance in my research career
  • Mentoring the next generation of African AI researchers

Interested in collaboration or community initiatives? Please get in touch.
